37048.「村王が 突然 武闘場の 正式な清めの儀式を\n 村の子供たちに見せたいと 言い:
Suddenly, the Village King wanted to show the village children the formal purification rituals of the fighting arena.
The purification ceremony, for many years, has been performed in a simplified form, and many children in the village had never seen a formal ceremony.

37049.「おお <pc> よく来てくれた。\n<br>\n「ちょっと 困っていることがあ:
Oh, , thank you for coming. I'm in a bit of a bind. I'm a bit embarrassed to ask this of the one who saved my life, but I have a favor to ask of you.
For the first time in a while, I'd like to perform the purification ceremony of the Village Arena, but I'm out of the special salt to be sprinkled there.
The special salt is called Eze Salt. As the name implies, it comes from Dwachakka's Ezesol Canyon Salt Lake.
Sorry, but could you go pick it up for me? Of course, I'll make it worth your while.

37050.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おお やってく:
Oh, you'll do it! That's what I'm talking about ! GAHAHA!
Near the entrance of the salt lake is a mountain cabin; there's a Dwarf who collects salt there, so you can ask him if you have any questions.
From there, Ezesol Canyon, , should be within walking distance. Well then, I'm counting on you.

37051.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おお やってく:

37052.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「そうかそうか！:

37067.「村王は オイラたちに いろんなことを\n 教えてくれる 先生なんだ。\n<br:

37068.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「村王が 村を出:
You think the Village King might be trying to leave the village? What nonsense...
There's no way the Village King is leaving Rangao Village. The Village King reasons for not leaving the village, y'know.

37069.「ああ そうかい。\n だったら 今の話は 忘れておくれ。\n 軽々しく 人に話:

37070.「やれやれ 仕方ないね……。\n じゃあ すこしだけ 教えてやるよ。\n<br>:
Oh well, can't be helped, can it... Then, I'll just tell you a little something.
Any old fogey in this village knows this. The Village King is waiting for someone to come back to the village.
Who is this certain someone? Umm. That's not something I want coming from my mouth, y'know. If you want to find out, you'll have to ask the Village King himself.
If you want to know where he is, Grandma Kossha, who lives at the end of the stairs next to the Weapon Shop, will know.

37071.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「やっぱり 村王:

37072.「ギュランさんが 村王さまのことを\n 探してらっしゃる？ そうですね……。\n:
Mr. Guran is looking for the Village King? That's right. He doesn't know anything about it. But all the old people in this village
know what the Village King is doing. Don't worry.

37073.「さっき 村の外に出ていく村王を見かけたが\n 悩みが すぐに顔に出るのは\n:
A while ago, I saw the Village King leaving the village with a troubled look on his face; that much hasn't changed a bit since he was a child.

37074.「村王は この村で ある人が帰ってくるのを\n 待ってるのさ。その ある人っての:
The Village King is waiting for someone to come back to this village. If you want to know who that someone is, you must ask the village
king directly. If you want to know where the Village King is, Grandma Kossha, who lives at the end of the stairs next to the Weapon Shop,
will probably know.

37075.「さっき 村の外に出ていく村王を見かけたが\n 悩みが すぐに顔に出るのは\n:
A while ago, I saw the Village King leaving the village with a troubled look on his face; that much hasn't changed a bit since he was a child.
Hmm? Jeral told you that I know where the Village King is? Good grief. That one's got loose lips, doesn't she.
Oh well, fine. I'll tell you. The Village King is in a cave in the Rangao Mountains. To the southeast, in a cave called Daz Grotto.
You should go to the bottom of Daz Grotto. You'll know why he's at such a place, when you do. Best to see it with your own eyes.

37076.「村王なら ランガーオ山地の 洞くつにおる。\n 村から見て 南東の方角にある\:
The Village King is in a cave in the Rangao Mountains. It is located at the end of a cave called Daz Grotto, which is to the southeast
of the village. Go to the end of Daz Grotto. You will know why you are in such a place when you get there. See for yourself.

37077.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「村王から 聞い:

83029.「それと村王が 手間をかけさせた おわびに\n この家で 身体を休めてゆけと言っ:

37078.「村王が ガガベスさんの お墓を作って\n ちょくちょく そこを訪ねてることは\:

Village King broke that rule and made this tomb.

34331.「まったく！ じいさんは\n 朝から晩まで ヤキトリのことばかり。\n ……ほん:

about yakitori from morning till night. It's
really a problem.

36292.「私は 世界各地に封印されている\n 伝説の怪物について 調べています。\n 今:
I've been researching the legendary monsters that are sealed up all over the world. Now that we have photo machines, it's easier to
keep track of them.

34350.「ここは 村王さまの部屋。\n 村王さまは 過去の武闘大会で いく度も\n チャ:

Village King is a man who has won many

85357.「昔 ちょっとだけ ツボ錬金を\n かじったことが あってね。\n ギルドマスタ:
I used to dabble in Pot Alchemy for a little
while. The guildmaster was a strict man.

34310.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「お前 すごいな:
You're amazing! You thought you were dead, but you came back to life! But now you know how scary Rhonda Ice Cave is. Only Jiganf, the
champion of the tournament, could train in a place like that!

34311.「ここは 武闘大会の名誉チャンピオン\n 村王クリフゲーンさまの お住まいだ。\:
This is the home of Chief Cliffgain, the honorary champion of the tournament. The Village King is concerned about the safety of
the village. If you notice anything, be sure to report it to the Village King.

34313.「ここは マイユさまのお部屋だ。\n 死にかけたって聞いたが\n 元気そうだな:
This is Maille's room. I heard you almost
died, but you look fine <pc>.

34314.「ここは マイユさまのお部屋だ。\n マイユさまは ご予定がある。\n あまり:
This is Maille's room. Mr. Maille has an
appointment. Don't stay too long.

34315.「<pc>は 知らないだろうけどな。\n この村には アロルドっていう\n 気の:
doesn't know this, though. There was a kind-hearted young man named Arold in this village. This slope reminds me of him.
Arold, Jiganf and Mr. Maille used to race each other to the top when we were kids. Arold couldn't win no matter what he did, but Jiganf
took care of him like a big brother. We were like real brothers.

34316.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「オーガのチカラ:
Ogre's power is strong. That is why we must not allow ourselves to be drowned by our power! We must not only strengthen our skills
and our bodies, but also our minds! That is the Ogre way of life and our pride! Be diligent, .

34317.「ここは ランガーオ村。\n 極寒の地に身を置き 自らを\n 厳しく きたえあげ:
This is Rangao Village, a village of ogres who put themselves in extremely cold conditions and strenuously strengthen themselves. Oh,
wow! You're safe! I was surprised when Mr. Maille carried you in his limp arms! Beyond the bridge to the west is
the Rhonda Ice Cave, where there are some strong monsters. You should have a beginner's weapon. Don't forget to equip yourself with
them before you go out. If you're low level, train near the village!

34318.「ここは ランガーオ村。\n 極寒の地に身を置き 自らを\n 厳しく きたえあげ:
This is Rangao Village, a village of ogres who live in the extreme cold and strengthen themselves severely. Beyond the bridge to the
west is the Rhonda Ice Cave, where there are strong monsters. You should have a beginner's weapon. Don't forget to equip them before you
go out. If you're low level, train near the village!

34319.「アタマが悪くても 武闘大会で\n チャンピオンになれば 大きな家を持てる。\n:
If I'm not smart enough, I can still win the fighting championship, and I can still own a big house. You can make life easy for Mom!
You'll see, Ma! Someday I'll be an unbeatable champion like Jiganf!

34322.「ジーガンフは 男気があり 村の中でも\n 皆に慕われている 立派な男だ。\n<:
Jiganf is a manly man and a fine man who is loved by everyone in the village. I don't think it's just Jiganf, but Maille is also
worried about Jiganf's change.

34323.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「がんばって 魔:
Even if you kill monsters as hard as you can, it's not enough to save money, right? The trick to earning money is not to keep things
you don't need right now, but to sell them to the stores and make money! That's what my father said!

34324.「ジーガンフは あたしの息子だよ。\n ガンコで 負けず嫌いで 意地っぱりだけど:
Jiganf is my son. He's stubborn, competitive, and stubborn, but he's the most honest and kindest boy I know. Even now that people say
that Jiganf will be the next King of the Village, he's been training from morning till night. But since about two years ago. She
sometimes makes a scary face. That's Worrying.

34325.「はあ 忙しい 忙しい。\n もうすぐ お客さんが来るんですよ。\n<br>\n:
I'm busy, busy, busy. We're going to have a guest soon. Maille is going to marry the most powerful man in the village as the daughter of
the Village King, just like her father wanted. If she's invited her childhood friend, Jiganf, to the house, maybe she'll tell him about her
marriage to the champion of the tournament, Jiganf.

daily grind. If you have nothing to do, leave
as soon as possible.

34330.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「むむむ……。カ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Mmmm. Looks like your bag is full. I can't
help you, but I'd like you to leave as soon as
possible.

36287.「まったく！ じいさんは\n 朝から晩まで ヤキトリのことばかり。\n ……ほん:
Not at all! My grandfather is always talking
about yakitori from morning till night. It's
really a problem.

34332.「昔から 村王は\n 娘のマイユを嫁にやるなら 村で\n いちばん強い男に……と:
The Village King had always said that if he wanted to marry off his daughter, Maille, to the most powerful man in the village. The man
to whom Maille will marry must be Jiganf, who has been the reigning champion of the village martial arts tournament for five years.

34333.「ガハハ！ <pc> 聞いたぞ！\n 死んでたのに 生き返ったそうじゃないか！\:
Gahaha! I heard! I heard that you came back from the dead! Even the Maille guy was surprised. By the way,
. I just had a question I wanted to ask you. What do you think of Jiganf, who showed overwhelming strength in
the recent martial arts tournament and became the champion for the fifth year in a row? Do you think he's been acting strange lately?

34334.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「そうか……。\: <attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I see. After all, you think so too.<bw_break>

34335.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「ふむ そうか…:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Hmm, I see. I hope I'm just imagining things,
but it's been bothering me.<bw_break>

34336.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「ジーガンフは:
Jiganf is stronger and more popular than anyone in the village. I had planned to appoint him as the next king of the village
and put him in charge of Maille. But something is not right with Jiganf these days. I can't explain it well, but I feel a sense of
disquiet that I didn't feel in Jiganf before. , if you notice anything about Jiganf, please let me know. I'm counting on you!

34337.「どうも 近頃のジーガンフは おかしい。\n うまく言えんが 以前のジーガンフに:
There is something wrong with Jiganf these days. I can't describe it, but I'm sensing something disturbing that I haven't seen in
Jiganf before. I've called in some help just in case, but if notices anything about Jiganf, please let me know. Thanks!

34338.「マイユさまの父 村王クリフゲーンさまも\n ひどい吹雪で 動けなくなった村人を:
Chief Cliffgain, Maille's father, once spent hours searching for a villager who was stuck in a terrible snowstorm and brought him back.
Both the Village King and Maille do so much for everyone in the village. I'm really grateful to them.

34340.「ルーラストーンは 使うと 記憶させた場所に\n またたく間に飛んでいくことがで:
The Zoomstone is a magical stone that can be used to instantly fly to the location you have memorized. You can use it over and over again,
so if you have one in your possession, you'll be safe when you go out. It is said that it is a rare and precious item.

36585.「魔物が やけに増えてますからね。\n 私の店で 防具を買って\n しっかり用心:
Monsters are increasing. You should buy some
protective gear at my store and be very
careful.<bw_break>

36586.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「<pc>よ。:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>O <pc>! You may thank God that your
lives have been spared. Now.<bw_break>

36587.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あら おかえり:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh, welcome back. I made sure to leave room
for <pc> today as well!<bw_break>

34342.「この先は 村の武闘場じゃよ。\n 毎年 武闘大会が行われる 神聖な場所であり\:
Just beyond is the Village Arena. It is a sacred place where martial arts tournaments are held every year, and where the children of
the village begin their training. Those who have reached the stage of actual competition fight monsters outside the village to raise
their level of skill. Only when they can easily defeat the enemies in this area do they go to Rhonda Ice Cave to test their skills.
It's a little early for .

34343.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「うん？ エテー:
Yeah? Did you say Ethene Village? I've never heard of it. You must have had a funny dream when you almost died. Excuse me? You don't
know yourself well? Well, for now, just relax and talk to the villagers. You'll remember who you are in time. You'll remember who you are
in time. Just go thank Maille later, okay? She must have gone through a lot of trouble to bring it here. As you know, Maille is the
daughter of the Village King. Her house is across the bridge next to the Armor Shop, which has a sign of a yoroi (armor). Say hello
to the Village King.

34344.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「ルーラストーン:
I heard you lost your Zoomstone. It's a very rare and precious item. When you use it, you can fly to the place you memorized. It's a
necessity for a practitioner like . You'd better hurry and find it before someone takes it away. You should also
look for it in the Rhonda Ice Cave to the west.

34347.「この先は 武闘場。\n 毎年 武闘大会が行われる 神聖な戦いの場だ。:
Beyond this point is the battlefield. It is a
sacred battlefield where martial arts
tournaments are held every year.

34349.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「今年の武闘大会:
Jiganf won this year's martial arts tournament as well! He is not a genius, but a hard worker. That's why we all look up to Jiganf
and aim for him.

34425.「ここは 村王さまの部屋。\n 村王さまは 過去の武闘大会で いく度も\n チャ:
This is the Village King's room. The
Village King is a man who has won many
champions in past martial arts tournaments.

34351.「<pc>が この村に来たのは １年前か。\n なら アロルドのことは知らないよ:
So came to this village a year ago. Then you don't know Arold, do you? He was in this village until two years ago. Arold
used to be like a little brother who followed Jiganf around, but he has come back much stronger and tougher. I couldn't believe it
when the Village King said he would become stronger. I guess the Village King had seen through Arold's power even back then.

34352.「ここは 武闘大会の名誉チャンピオン\n 村王クリフゲーンさまの お住まいだ。:
This is the home of Chief Cliffgain, the
honorary champion of the tournament.

34353.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「アロルドを 村:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>It seems it was the Village King who called
Arold back to the village. I wonder why he
called Arold back?

34354.「ここは ランガーオ村。\n 極寒の地に身を置き 自らを\n 厳しく きたえあげ:
This is Rangao Village, a village of ogres who put themselves in the extreme cold and strenuously strengthen themselves. Arold is
back. Come to think of it, you don't know anything about him, do you? He was a childhood friend of Maille and Jiganf. He went on a
training trip two years ago, but the village king called him to come back.

34355.「マイユさまは お父さまの望みどおり\n 村王の娘として 村で いちばん強い男の:
As the daughter of the Village King, Maille is going to marry the most powerful man in the village, just like her father wanted. If she
has invited her childhood friend to the house, she might report her marriage to Jiganf, the champion of the tournament.

34356.「アロルドは 子供の頃から\n 気が弱いっていうか 優しいっていうか\n とにか:
Arold has always been a bit timid or gentle as a child, but he never did anything about it, even when people made fun of him. Maille used
to save him from the bad kids. ''Don't bully Arold,'' she would say! She used to say.

47567.「こんにちは。\n ルーラストーンを お持ちなのですね。\n では 使い方を 説:
Hello. I see that you have Zoomstone. Let me explain how to use it. The Zoomstone is a stone with a very wonderful magic power that
allows you to fly to the place you memorized in no time at all. Once you visit a town, village, or church, it will automatically be
memorized, and Rangao Village should already be there. You can memorize as many places as you want, so the more you memorize, the more
places you can fly to. You can also use Zoomstone to memorize the mysterious stone monuments in the field or at the entrance of
Dan Jon. You can use the Zoomstone from the ''item'' menu. Frequently visited places areYou can also register it in your favorites at

47568.「ルーラストーンは 使うと 記憶させた場所に\n またたく間に飛んでいくことがで:
The Zoomstone is a stone with a wonderful magic power that allows you to fly to the place you memorized in no time at all. Once
you visit a town or village with a church, it will be automatically memorized, so Rangao Village should already be there. You can
memorize as many places as you want, so the more you memorize, the more places you can fly to. You can also use Zoomstone to memorize the
mysterious stone monuments in the field or at the entrance of Dan Jon. You can use the Zoomstone from the ''item'' menu. Frequently
visited places areYou can also register it in your favorites at

34357.「ルーラストーンが見つかった？ よかったねえ！\n 試しに『どうぐ』から 使って:
Did you find Zoomstone? Good for you! Try it out on the ''items'' page! It should remember this village. If you don't understand, ask
Piriri at the church. She knows a lot about Zoomstone! What? Have you seen a strange Jiganf at Rhonda Cape? You'd better hurry up
and report anything important like that to the Village King!

34358.「おお <pc>。\n 村王さまに 急ぎの用事か？\n それなら 部屋に入るがい:
Oh, <pc>. You have urgent business
with the Village King? Then go into your room.

34359.「思えば アロルドが修行の旅に出たのは\n ２年前の武闘大会で ジーガンフに\n:
Thinking back, Arold started his training right after he lost to Jiganf in a martial arts tournament two years ago. I don't know
what kind of training Arold has been doing, but I don't think he can match Jiganf yet.

34360.「ここは 武闘大会の名誉チャンピオン\n 村王クリフゲーンさまの お住まいだ。:
This is the home of Chief Cliffgain, the
honorary champion of the tournament.

34361.「マイユさんが 武闘場へ行くなんて\n めずらしいと思ったら\n アロルドと 待:
I thought it was unusual for Maille to go to the battlefield, but I guess he was meeting up with Arold. Now all we need is for Jiganf to
arrive and we'll have the three best friends from childhood!

34362.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「さっき マイユ:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>I saw Maille a while ago, but she seemed to be
in low spirits. Is she worried about
something?

34363.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「アロルドが帰っ:
Arold's coming back, it looks like Maille and Jiganf's wedding might be finally coming soon. I'm sure Maille is anxious about her upcoming
wedding, but I'm sure she will be relieved to see her childhood friend Arold's face.

34364.扉は かたく 閉ざされている。: The door is locked up tight

34365.「この先は 武闘場。\n 毎年 武闘大会が行われる 神聖な戦いの場だ。\n マイ:
Beyond this point is the battlefield. It is a sacred battlefield where martial arts tournaments are held every year. Maille and
Arold are inside.

34366.「ふ～ん。弱虫のアロルドも 修行の旅で\n ちょっとは マシになったみたいね。\:
Hmmm. It seems that the wimpy Arold has gotten a little better on his training trip. But compared to Jiganf, he still has a long way to
go.

34367.「<pc>。\n ジェニャに 追いだされたようだな。\n あの子の したたかさに:
. Looks like Jenya kicked you to the curb. She's not as tough as she seems. I heard that Arold in the Village Arena told you
to say hello to him. Maybe the Village King is more interested in you than I thought. The battlefield is in this village. If you go up
the hill to the north from the plaza, you will reach the sacred battlefield.

34368.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「う～む……。\:

wonder if there is some kind of incident.

34369.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「び び び び:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Surprise, surprise, surprise! A black guy
jumped over the mountain carrying Mr. Maille!

34370.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「あ…あの 気高:
The noble champion Jiganf has signed a contract with Demon Zongalon? He's a legendary monster that was sealed away by a thousand
Ogres working together long ago. ! Get to Rhonda Cape where Jiganf is headed before it's too late! And don't
forget to be prepared!

34371.「ここは ランガーオ村。\n 極寒の地に身を置き 自らを\n 厳しく きたえあげ:
This is Rangao Village. It is a village of Ogres who have to strenuously strengthen themselves in the extreme cold. It seems that
the Village King and Arold are running west toward the Rhonda Ice Cave. The Village King is always young, no matter how old he is!

34372.「オイラ ジーガンフさんの気持ち わかるよ。\n 戦う時は 互いに全力を尽くすの:
I Jiganf, I know how you feel. When fighting,
it's polite to give each other your all. It is
a terrible humiliation to be left out.

34373.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ジーガンフを見:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>I saw Jiganf and told him that Arold had
returned. Jiganf looked really scared and ran
to the fighting arena.

34374.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「武闘場の辺りが:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>There was a lot of noise around the
battlefield. Most likely some kind of monster
came out. It happens from time to time.

34375.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「いったい 何が:
What the hell is going on? Jiganf came back and the three childhood friends were just about to be together at last. There are
screams coming from the battlefield, and the Village King and Arold are running away from the village!

34376.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「武闘場で 騒ぎ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>There was a commotion in the arena. Are you
all right? The Village King and Arold are
running out of here looking for trouble.

34377.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「ねえ なんか:
Hey, isn't there a bad vibe here? I could hear Maille's screams and Jiganf's yells. No way! A love triangle! Jiganf and Arold are rivals?
Oh,my gosh, what's going to happen~

34378.「ジェニャなら ホクホクした顔で出ていったよ。\n 村王さまに たっぷりと こづ:
Jenya left with a relieved look on her face.
The Village King must have given her a
generous allowance. She's a good girl!

34379.「ここは 武闘大会の名誉チャンピオン\n 村王クリフゲーンさまの お住まいだ。\:
This is the home of Chief Cliffgain, the honorary champion of the tournament. . The King of the Village is
waiting for you.

34380.「マイユさまが 無事 お戻りになられたのだ！\n お手柄だったな <pc>！\n:
The Maille has returned safely! Well done,
<pc>! Now, go to the King of the
Village's room!

34381.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「マイユさんが:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I heard Mr. Maille came back safe and sound.
I'm glad to hear that!

34382.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「……なに？\n:
What? That white light brought Jiganf back to his senses and sealed Demon Zongalon once again? What a miracle! I guess the gods of war
saw Jiganf's loyalty and saved him!

34383.「ここは ランガーオ村。\n 極寒の地に身を置き 自らを\n 厳しく きたえあげ:
This is Rangao Village. It is the village of the Ogres, who live in the extreme cold and strengthen themselves severely. The village
kings have all returned. Jiganf looked very tired.

34384.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「さっき 真っ白:
A true white light fell from the sky and we all found ourselves in the light. It was a warm light. There was a bit of a commotion,
wondering what it was all about.

34385.「この先は 村の武闘場じゃよ。\n ランガーオ村で生まれた者なら 誰でも\n 武:
Beyond this point is the Village Arena. Anyone
who was born in Rangao Village has memories of
the fighting arena.

34386.「ジーガンフの顔が 憑きものが落ちたように\n おだやかだったねえ。\n あの子:
Jiganf's face was calm as if possessed. I haven't seen that kind of expression on his face in a long time. By the way, the village
king asked me to tell to come to his house if he sees him. He said he wanted to thank you.

34387.「空いっぱいに広がった あの光は\n いったい なんだったんだろう？\n あんな:
What in the world was that light that filled
the sky? I've never seen such a divine sight
before.

34388.「おお <pc>！\n 村王さまが ぜひ お礼をしたいとお待ちだ。\n さあ 中:
Oh, <pc>! The King of the Village is
waiting for you to pay his respects. Come,
come inside.

34389.「村王が アロルドを呼びもどしたのは\n ふたりを戦わせ マイユさまの結婚相手を:
I guess the reason the Village King brought Arold back was to have them fight and decide who Maille would marry! But I didn't know that
Jiganf lost. I wish I could have seen that duel. I wish I could have seen the duel. I'm sure it would have been a match that will go
down in history!

34390.「この村では 毎年 武闘大会が開かれていて\n 圧倒的な強さを誇る ジーガンフと:
In this village, a martial arts tournament is held every year, and a man named Jiganf, who is overwhelmingly strong, has been the
reigning champion for a long time. Everyone thought that Maille, the daughter of the Village King, would marry Jiganf, but a young
man named Arold, summoned by the Village King, defeated Jiganf and Maille became Arold's bride and left with him. Oh, my God, it was so
sweet.

34391.「ここは 武闘大会の名誉チャンピオン\n 村王クリフゲーンさまの お住まいだ。\:
This is the home of Chief Cliffgain, the honorary champion of the tournament. Arold, Mr. Maille and even Jiganf have left the
village. But they all looked good.

34392.「ここは 武闘大会の名誉チャンピオン\n 村王クリフゲーンさまの お住まいだ。:
This is the home of Chief Cliffgain, the
honorary champion of the tournament.

34393.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「お手柄だったな:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Nice work <pc>! I was happy to see
your happy smile too.

34394.「ここは 村王の娘 マイユさまのお部屋。\n だが マイユさまは 旅に出られたま:
This is the room of Maille, the daughter of the Village King. However, Maille has been away on a journey for a long time. It is my
mission to protect this room until the day she returns to fulfill the purpose of her journey!

34395.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おっす！ <p:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Ossssss! <pc>! Enjoy your adventures,
but get some training in!

36275.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おっす！ 旅人:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh, yes! Traveler! Enjoy your adventurous
journey, but do some training too!

36276.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「オーガのチカラ:
Ogre's power is strong. That is why we must not allow ourselves to be drowned by our power! We must not only strengthen our skills
and our bodies, but also our minds! That is the Ogre way of life, and that is our pride!

34398.「ここは ランガーオ村。\n 極寒の地に身を置き 自らを\n 厳しく きたえあげ:
This is Rangao Village. It is a village of Ogres who put themselves in the extreme cold and strenuously strengthen themselves. If you
leave here and follow the road south, you will reach Lion Gate. There is a train station at Glen Castle. You should go there.

34399.「ここは ランガーオ村。\n 極寒の地に身を置き 自らを\n 厳しく きたえあげ:
This is Rangao Village, a village of ogres who
put themselves in extremely cold conditions
and strenuously strenuous themselves.

34400.「見てろよ！ 母ちゃん！\n オイラ 修行して いつか絶対\n チャンピオンにな:
Watch it! I'm going to train and one day I'm
going to be a champion! I'll train hard and
one day I'll be a champion!

34401.「私たちオーガは 全身全霊をかけて勝負に臨む。\n 最高の技には 最高の技で応え:
We at Ogre put our whole heart and soul into our games. It is only polite to respond to the best with the best, and there is no such thing
as cutting corners. But Arold is Jiganf's younger brother. He knew that Jiganf loved Maille, so he couldn't fight.

34402.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「マイユおねえちゃん: <attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Maille girl, right? She looked so happy.

34403.「ジーガンフは 行ってしまったよ。\n だけど あんなに晴れ晴れとした\n あの:
Jiganf is gone. But it's been a while since I've seen her face so radiant. Someday, she'll clean up her own mess. She said she's going to
defeat Demon Zongalon.

34404.「あたしの息子は ジーガンフっていうんだ。\n 小さい頃から ガンコで 負けず嫌:
My son is called Jiganf. Ever since he was little, he's been stubborn, competitive, and mean. But he is my only son and I am proud of
him. Now he is on a journey to defeat a monster called Demon Zongalon.

34405.「わしには わかっておりましたとも。\n マイユさまは 子供の頃から ずーっと\:
I knew it. Since she was a child, Lady Maille had always been fond of the gentle Arold. But she couldn't tell anyone her true feelings
because she thought that marrying a champion would be the best way to show her filial piety. I'm glad that Mr. Maille and Arold are
now together! Now I can aim at Mr. Jiganf with pride. Psst

34406.「マイユさまは 村王の娘として\n チャンピオンと結婚するのが 親孝行だと\n:
As the daughter of the Village King, Maille thought it was her filial duty to marry the champion. She was truly grateful to her father
for raising her with so much love and affection after her mother's death. However, the champion was defeated by Arold, and Maille
was finally able to be with her beloved Arold.

36286.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「ボクは このプ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>I'm here in my private room to unwind from the
daily grind. If you have nothing to do, leave
as soon as possible.

34408.「ジーガンフも 旅立ったそうだな。\n 何があったのか知らないけど\n 旅は 人:
I heard that Jiganf left too. I don't know what happened to him, but traveling makes you grow up a lot. I'm sure Jiganf and Arold will
grow stronger and stronger.

34409.「すこし前の 話なんだが\n この村へ 修行にきていた若者が\n いつの間にか:
It was a while ago, but a young man who came to this village for training disappeared before I knew it. When I was looking at you,
for some reason I remembered that young man. I wonder how he is doing now.

34410.「英雄の証キーエンブレムとは\n 町や城で 手柄を立てた者に与えられる勲章で\n:
The Key Emblem, a sign of heroism, is a medal given to those who have distinguished themselves in a town or castle, and as the
name suggests, it is said to be in the shape of a key. There is a Black Key Emblem in Glen Castle in the southwest and a Red Key Emblem
in Gartland Castle in the far south. If you collect the key emblems, you will meet someone who knows the real you. Spread your wings to
the world ! Gahahahaha!

34411.「……旅の者か。\n マイユから この村で起きた事件のことを\n 聞いてきたのか:
Are you a traveler? Did Maille tell you about
the incident in this village? Would you like
to hear more about it?<yesno><break>

34412.「では お前さんのチカラを見込んで\n アロルドと ジーガンフの間にあったことを:
Now, in anticipation of your ability, I will tell you the story of what happened between Arold and Jiganf. Jiganf, the champion of the
tournament, hated Arold for spoiling the tournament two years earlier when Arold had given up the victory to Jiganf. To avenge his
wrongdoing, Jiganf, seeking strength in the dark, was taken advantage of by the legendary Demon Zongalon, and went on a rampage. Thanks
to the efforts of a certain Ogre youth, Jiganf's rampage was stopped and Demon Zongalon was sealed away once again. One day,
Demon Zongalon will have to be dealt with. When that time comes, please lend me your help!

34413.「そうか……。\n 小さな村だが ゆっくりしていくといい。:
Okay. It's a small village, but take your
time.

34414.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「マイユさまが:
I heard that Maille-sama has miraculously tied the knot with Arold, whom she had been secretly attracted to. How romantic! Even so,
Jiganf is wonderful, isn't he? To think of your beloved Maille's happiness first and foremost, that's just as I expected!

34415.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「この村には 村:
In this village, there were two good childhood friends, Maille, the daughter of the village king, and Jiganf, her brother, and Arold, her
younger brother. But both Jiganf and Arold seemed to like Maille. There were many things that happened, but in the end, Lady Maille was
miraculously united with Arold, whom she had secretly had a crush on! How romantic! But you know what, Jiganf showed his true colors too!
He put his beloved Maille's happiness first and stepped aside!

47407.「北の果てにある こんな村にも 旅人さんが\n よく いらっしゃるようになりまし:
We are getting a lot of travelers to this
village in the far north. Not so long ago,
this place was full of Ogre.

36588.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「さみしくなるわね。:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I will miss you. But come stay with us anytime
<pc>.<bw_break>

34417.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この先は 村の:
Just beyond is the Village Arena. It is a sacred place where martial arts tournaments are held every year and where the children of
the village begin their training. The arena holds many memories for the people of this village.

34418.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「すべてが 自然:
Everything seems to have settled into its natural form. Thanks to , right? I can tell by the Proof of Adulthood. That's
what you came to this village to train for. You finally got the credit! Congratulations! Even if you leave Rangao Village, please come
back and visit us once in a while!

34419.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「こんな へんぴ:
I'm surprised you came all the way to this remote village. Please come and meet Chief Cliffgain. Chief's house is across the bridge
next to the Armor Shop.

34420.「<pc>も この村で生まれた者だったら\n 武闘大会に出られたのに……。\n:
If only had been born in this village, he could have participated in the martial arts tournament. I wish I could have
seen you fight.

34422.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ジーガンフさん 大:
I hope Mr. Jiganf is okay. He was very protective of Ms. Maille. I can see that from the outside. I wish I could soothe Mr.
Jiganf's heart.

34423.「この村では 毎年 武闘大会が行われているの。\n ５年連続 チャンピオンになっ:
There is a martial arts tournament held every year in this village. Jiganf, the champion five years in a row, is traveling somewhere
right now.

34424.「ここは 村王さまの お部屋。\n <pc>になら 村王さまは\n いつでも お:
This is the Village King's room. If it's you,
<pc>, the Village King is sure to always meet
with you whenever.

36298.「ここは 村王さまの部屋。\n 村王さまは 過去の武闘大会で いく度も\n チャ:

34426.「オレたち オーガという種族は\n 極限まで強さを極めようと 命を燃やす！\n:

34428.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「<pc> 元気:

34429.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「どっひゃ～！:

oooooooo! <pc>! You've even gotten a

34430.<if_hum>「ここは ランガーオ村。\n 極寒の地に身を置き 自らを\n 厳:
This is Rangao Village, a village of ogres who put themselves in the extreme cold and strenuously strengthen themselves.
Oh, It's been a while! What? Have you become a human? Well, you were like that before, weren't you?This is Rangao Village, a village of ogres who put themselves in the extreme cold and strenuously strengthen themselves.
Oh, It's been a long time! It's nice to see someone who left the village come back like this. Please take your time!

34432.「マイユさまが旅立たれた直後の 村王は\n とても さびしそうな ご様子だったが:
The Village King seemed to be very sad right after the departure of the Mailed Lady, but now he seems to have regained his strength. He

34433.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「がんばって 魔:
Even if you kill monsters as hard as you can, it's not enough to save money, right? The trick to earning money is not to keep things

34434.「ジーガンフは あれから\n 一度も 帰ってきていないよ。\n<br>\n「いつ:
